website_summaries.verdict: A professional-grade cream that cures inflammation to thwart pain.
pros: Its primary ingredients work wonders for inflammation, which is the common cause for most pain
It avoids any burning sensations when applied, making it great for those with sensitive skin
It's not too greasy and has a mildly pleasant smell that doesn't linger
cons: Some users would prefer a stronger formula with quicker results

customer_reviews.title: Made my heart rate speed up
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days of application a weird thing happened—-While I was in the grocery store checking out Suddenly I felt my heart beat ramp up and I started physically shaking so bad I could hardly Insert my credit card into the reader - I stopped using the cream and the further I get away from using the cream the better I’m starting to feel.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: Read between the lines of the amazing reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know. The reviews for this product don't live up to my experience. I've tried it according to the label and I've been trying it for 2 weeks. My hands still hurt from arthritis. I am losing my ability to grab things and my grip is getting weaker because of the pain. This product is doing nothing to live up to the hype.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Romano

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for Rheumatoid arthritis or swelling from hypertension.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 69 year old father who has RA and PHT. Unfortunately it did nothing for swelling from either - he tried it on his hands (RA) and on swollen ankles from PHT. He likened it a bit to Ben Gay or similar products, but did not get any real relief from it whatsoever. I had high hopes based on the reviews but the product simply didn't do anything that it says it does for my father.
customer_reviews.author: Seventh-777Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Been using this product for over a few months now to absolutely no relief. Using four times a day for arthritis in Hands,neck,shoulders. Still no relief. I’m not sure where all these positive reviews are coming from? Have contacted Penetrex for some feedback as to what can be done for further relief but absolutely no replies back. I’ve seen a site that says to go to YouTube download what you think of product and they’ll give you three jars for free? Maybe that’s where the positive feedback comes from?
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately......no help.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose one would have to give this product either one star or five stars. It either works or it does not. For me the latter was the result. I purchased a 4 oz jar and used it for a month. Unfortunately, it didn't help my arthritic condition at all. So the jar sits in the medicine cabinet where it will probably remain until I throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: GLMamerow

customer_reviews.title: Cost and application...
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not given the product the full 7-10 days of full use, I will start with the fact it is not an instant or within hours type of relief cream. For those seeking a quicker response, this is not your product. The 8 oz jar is rather small for the price considering the amount of applications required for max benefits. I am lucky if I have enough time in the day for one application, let alone 3. I have found I appreciate a faster response in pain relief with using store bought Aspercreme and will probably stick to that for the cost and relief expectations I’m seeking.
customer_reviews.author: Lonni Winsand

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My mom has been suffering from rheumatoid arthritis since she was in her 20s. It's starting to spread in her body and I bought this in hopes it would help her. It goes on smooth and has a nice sleep and isn't greasy, but it doesn't do anything else for her. Nothing for her pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lemon.pope

customer_reviews.title: It had really worked before on my bad knee. I still want to believe in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not feel the same relief that I had with my first jar that I bought months ago. It had really worked before on my bad knee. I still want to believe in the product but for now, I am shelving it here at home and it is just not proving effective. I will use it up before it expires but not sure I will re-purchase in case I get another "bad batch". I do not recommend the roll on one either. That was a waste of cash.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle. I was very apprehensive, but reviews were so stellar, so decided to try. After 10days (applied 3 times a day) and gentle stretches, my knee was markedly better. I cannot believe it! Of course, I still practice common sense with the knee: wear a brace on my walks, do stretches daily and work on strengthening the joint, but Penetrex has been really, really helpful. Has to be the Penetrex because it is the only thing different after months of pain... I have recommended to a number of friends and family to try.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia A Frutuoso

customer_reviews.title: A super pain reliever that I can't live without!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 big bone spurs on my right knee. All of the spurs look like curved, sharp horns. Walking, sitting, and sleeping were unbearable even with heavy pain killers. Then I found Penetrex and my life has improved! I have used it as instructed and my pain is often 100 % gone. It has been a godsend for me. Since there's a 7 month backlog until I can have my knee replaced, I am so glad this WORKS. Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Skipperooney

customer_reviews.title: Penetrex = Better sleep for me
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy in my feet and most nights experience a great deal of 'burning' in the bottom of each foot. For many months it was almost impossible to fall asleep because of the condition. I'd toss and turn for hours trying to find a spot 'cool' enough to stop the burning. Of course, there was no such spot. I read about Penetrex and decided it was worth a try. And it DOES help tremendously. The burning sensation isn't totally eliminated. BUT it IS calmed down enough so that it is barely perceptible and my brain no longer registers it as PAIN! Now I keep Penetrex on my nightstand and don't plan on doing without it again........
customer_reviews.author: Currmama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product with Quality Ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I have Fibromyalgia and if I could take a bath with this stuff I would! I cannot go to sleep without applying this to my knees and feet and anywhere else I have pain! Such a great product with an excellent combination of ingredients that do not burn, smell or sting. Not a mentholated product that just masks the pain. You do have to read the directions and use as directed to feel the results. It is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: L.J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Not returning the product not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Good morning I'm not going to send the cream back but I'm sorry to say that it does not work on my pain I put it on my legs I put it on my shoulders and I put it on my back it just doesn't have a bengay smell but it's just like putting cream on and it doesn't do anything so I'm I'm keeping the products because I did try to use it and it's not fair to give it back to you but I'm not happy with it that's all I have to say thank you and maybe they'll be better products out of there in the future take care
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Manca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. My husband was told he would need a knee replacement on both knees, he did cortisone shots, rooster cone shots and nothing was helping. He was having a lot of pain and having trouble walking. I came across this product on Amazon while looking for something else, so I ordered the small 2 oz. Just to try it, and within 2 days the swelling, feverish redness and pain were gone from both of his knees. He is now walking around without a limp and said his knees feel better than they have in years.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Does not have the slightest affect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for arthritis and general aches and pains after playing a round of golf. Nice creamy formula with no overwhelming smell but it did absolutely nothing to relieve or even mask my discomfort. I followed the directions to the letter and could just as well rubbed on peanut butter. The label on the shipping envelope said “Live Customer Support” with a phone number, which has been called many, many times since receiving the product, with no response. Don’t waste your money, time or efforts fooling with this mess.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN R.

customer_reviews.title: After two months of use it didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: My dad swears by this stuff and got me to order it. I'm a tennis player and CrossFitter with all kinds of aches and pain regularly. I got penetrex mainly because of the many posts that claimed it helped with neck pain (my constant issue). After about two months of quite regular usage I'm sorry to say I have not felt any relief from pain or inflammation from this Creme. It has a very nice scent and I'll keep trying it in the meantime, but It hasn't provided relief for any area I've tried it on (neck, lower back, knees, Achilles, shoulder). :(
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Francis

customer_reviews.title: Significantly reduced my pain level!
customer_reviews.text: I used many things to reduced pain cause by inflammation. Over the counter medication, prescription medication, injections, supplements about 1 year! NOTHING helped until I found PENETREX! Used it 4-5 times a day for 5 weeks or so, every time my shoulder/arm began to hurt, I rubbed in Penetrex, it did reduce the pain level. Now I use it 1-2 day. Absolutely recommending this product! Love the scent, goes on easily, absorbs fast, doesn't leave residue, scent dicipates quickly. Absolutely LOVE and RECOMMEND this product! Hope it works for everyone as well as it did for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: NO PAIN RELIEF
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. I used this product two weeks before my review to see if it would need time to penetrate into my lower back area. NOTHING. Would not buy again and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BUTTER

customer_reviews.title: So far no pain relief at all.
customer_reviews.text: Product was intended to provide some pain relief to my joints but despite my efforts I am still having pain. I plan to continue using it a few more days in hope to feel a bit better
customer_reviews.author: mar

customer_reviews.title: Neuropathy Relief
customer_reviews.text: This product is GREAT for removing the burning in feet and sore feet pain. I use it every night and morning to get me through the pain free. It is rather expensive but well worth it. I've tried everything including prescription creams from the doctor but Penetrex is definately the best! Also relieved burning in my lower leg and helps to reduce nerve swelling and increase blood flow.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Probst

customer_reviews.title: Real Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Penetrex for 2 years now to treat my inflammation, arthritis and degenerative meniscus in my knee. It works great, it works quickly and I love the smell. The swelling disappeared in 5 days. It will always be party of my medicine pantry. When I first used it, I had to use it often and all day long, and before I knew it that lessened and now I use it at the onset and maybe once to twice a day but that's not everyday. I also used it after my laminectomy and residual nerve pain, it truly helped, this stuff is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Marvin S.

customer_reviews.title: Zero Effect
customer_reviews.text: Got this for muscle pain. This did absolutely nothing and wow so expensive I thought surely, it would have SOME EFFECT. None. Zero. Not even a menthol type of tingling. Not even a superficial kind of relief. I had my husband try it too. Nothing. what a rip off. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Janet J. Choi

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I used this just about every morning before I go to work. I use it on my knees. I have nerve damage in both legs and the Penetrex helps to relieve some of the discomfort, if not all of it. Sometimes I run a little late for work and I don't have time to put it on. That's a bad day. The pain sets in later in the morning and last all. I love this product and I have been using it for a little over year. I have recommended this crème to a few friends. I like to pass on information about a product, especially if I know it works.
customer_reviews.author: bigdog

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was encouraged to buy this from a person I met...she swore by it...said it got rid of her pain quickly. When I got home, I looked on Amazon and ordered it. It worked great. Because I seemed to be pain free, I stopped using it. The pain came back really bad...I don't dare be without it now.
customer_reviews.author: mg0569

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandma who is a heart patient with severe arthritis. She has had triple bypass surgery and is allergic to a lot of pain creams. This one was strong yet effective. She is only able to tolerate a little portion of this cream at a time but it does provide her with great pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Ravina

customer_reviews.title: Offers long lasting pain relief with use that other products don't.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to derive pain relief from the severe osteo & rheumatoid arthritis that I have throughout my body. When I was only in my 40's I was told that my hand x rays looked like they belonged to the hands of an 80 year old. I am now 62 & these deteriorative processes have forced me onto disability. I am truly grateful whenever I happen upon some product, like Penetrex, that will finally give me some real pain relief. If it wasn't so far out of my economic league, I buy it by the bucket so that I could totally submerge myself. It really does work & work well.
customer_reviews.author: Rose N. Heard

customer_reviews.title: This works well and absorbs good.
customer_reviews.text: Summary: This cream was purchased for a senior in our household who has arthritis. The product works well for pain relief and absorbs relatively good without being too greasy. The person has skin sensitivity, but this did not cause any reactions. Pros: 1) Absorbs well 2) Not too greasy 3) Provides good muscle pain relief 4) Doesn't have an overwhelming scent 5) Good ingredients Cons: 1) None so far
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: with over 5000+ reviews, do they really need one more to convince you?
customer_reviews.text: two months into healing a simple fracture with severe muscle and nerve trauma, nerves have slowly begun to reconnect and with them sharp localized shooting pain and muscle spasms. I'd used this product previously with little benefit, my normal chronic pain is deep tissue. this pain however was very much on the surface, and penetrex does an excellent job of providing rapid relief through topical application for these misfiring nerves as I heal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Product for Pain
customer_reviews.text: This cream truly helped my sister with sudden plaque Psoriasis. The condition is commonly slow to get under control and may take months to heal. ➖ Very important to completely rub in the cream until the skin is nearly dry. Apply several times a day. Within just four days, she had noticeable relief of pain and inflammation. Skin healing progressed substantially over six weeks. That is pretty amazing for such a condition! PENETREX is mildly scented, does not sting, freeze or burn. She will keep PENETREX handy to soothe various inflammation and pain; and to improve the rate of healing.
customer_reviews.author: EuniceABC

customer_reviews.title: Fibromyalgia and nerve damage
customer_reviews.text: With my nerve damage and fibromyalgia this is a must have. I put it on every morning before i dress and every night before i get into bed. If I miss a spot I feel it and have to apply. Don't expect it to be a miracle cure, but slong side my 3 pain medications this is a must have!! It does take about 2 weeks before it kicks in all the way. And taking a few minutes to rub it in instead of just slapping it on allows the product to do its job and makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harris

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works miracles
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mother at the recommendation of a friend. She said it was a miracle cream that made her arthritic feet with plantar fasciitis feel better almost instantly. I didn't believe it but since my mom complained of the same things I got it for her. She put it away and forgot about it. Fast forward months later - she pulled it out to try it because her feet were pounding after a day in New York and she said the same thing the recommender did - the cream was wonderful and worked practically instantly. She wants me to order her another tub already.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: BEST PAIN RELIEF ON THE MARKET & NO SMELL
customer_reviews.text: THERE ARE NO OTHER RUBS ON PAIN RELIEF MEDICATIONS THAT I HAVE TRIED THAT WORKED...ONLY THIS ONE AND THE BONUS IS..NO SMELL...IT WORKS FOR EVERYTHING. SORE KNEES,SHOULDER,BACK ..IT RUBS IN AND GOES TO WORK ON THE PAIN. NOT SOME GIMMICK THAT SMELLS LIKE MENTHOL OR BURNS LIKE FIRE..JUST A CREAM THAT PENETRATES THE SKIN AND HELPS WITH PAIN. THE PRICE IS GREAT AND IT ONLY TAKES A LITTLE TO EASE THE PAIN.
customer_reviews.author: bird lady

customer_reviews.title: Did not produce the same results as past purchases.
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this items several times in the past with great results , this time the cream had no effect, may as well have been regular lotion. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I was quite disappointed in this product. I used it as directed, and actually Ben-Gay works a whole lot better. I have arthritis in my knees, and maybe this product is not meant for arthritis, so maybe I ordered it under a false assumption, but really save the money folks and use stinky old Ben-Gay, it does work, and my arthritis is back under control. The reason for the two stars? I does not smell much...but it also does not work, at least not for my arthritis.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It works fast!!
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis in foot and plantar fasciitis. Very painful for a month before I found this product. Literally within one day much pain was relieved enough that I could sleep without my foot wrapped. The next morning for the first time in a month I could put my foot on the floor without pain. Day 2 even better. This product is absolutely amazing. So glad I found it. It will last a long time because very little of the cream is needed to work. Smells nice...tea tree oil scent.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Penetrex - an excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Tried Blue Emu and Australian Dream but neither worked for me. I have arthritis in my neck and the only OTC product which has given me any relief is Penetrex. I've been using it for nearly two years now. It doesn't relieve the pain entirely but enough toget through the day. I also apply it at night before bedtime. I hope they don't stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Greer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pain caused by Inflammation!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby uses this on his knee and shoulder. He said it helps with pain caused by inflammation. It is not good to take a lot of Ibuprofen, so this is another way to help with pain caused by inflammation. I have tried it myself and it doesn't seen to help me much, but my knee is injured and I just need to have it fixed. So, it's not going to help your pain if you have an injury that requires surgery. But for inflammation pain it seems to work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee23

customer_reviews.title: Miracle product for my arthritis
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in several places. These joints have been bad enough to awaken me several times a night. To be honest, I'd just figured it was a part of my life. I saw this product here on Amazon and decided to give it a try. The very first day, I felt a marked difference. By the third day, I was able to do many of the physical activities that I'd not been able to do This product is enabling me to use my body and therefore the arthritic joints more than I have in nearly 15 years. Great product for anyone who has either joint pain or muscle/tendon pain.
customer_reviews.author: AZN8TV

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be doing what we bought it to do.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been suffering from hip and leg pain so we purchased this due to all the positive reviews. We had been using Arnica gel and rubbing oil but this seems much better. No mess with this product it is quickly absorbed. Every day since receiving the product my wife feels a little better. The jar says 7 to 10 days but she felt a little relief the first day. Will be keeping this around to address some of our aches and pains from now on.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beane

customer_reviews.title: Great for arthritis, fibromyalgia, and scoliosis pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in most of my joints, fibromyalgia, lupus, and sensitive skin, so finding a product that's actually helpful with the pain has been an issue. I bought this on a lightening deal and so glad I did! It has helped tremendously and now I'm able to sleep most of the night pain free. When I'm in a flare, I rub this on and it eases the stiffness and pain so I can function better. It rubs in easily and the smell is pleasant. No greasy residue. Don't irritate my skin and no burning sensation. It has also helped my daughter with her scoliosis pain.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K

customer_reviews.title: Moderate relief better than you older formulations for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: Name indicates deeper penetration than actually happens. But it is better than many other older formulations. Must be rubbed in really well. Effectiveness may depend on one's own chemistry makeup. Applying moderate heat after rubbing this in may give extra penetration, but not for people with diabetes and similar sensitivities.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Eclectica

customer_reviews.title: Gave me rashes ...
customer_reviews.text: It happened by using salonpas and icy hot products.I really have hyper sensitive skin pretty much especially face and any body areas that are thin sensitive skin areas..Is this one okay to use not to have rash with bumps almost looking like chicken pox?because that is what I got using other products...
customer_reviews.author: KIkiP00

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief ointment
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Was in the ER for severe sciatica, and was given an injection into the S-I joint for pain relief, then prescribed lidocaine patches which did help, but I have to say that Penetrex works better than the lidocaine patches, so I'm using that exclusively. Yes, it is expensive, but you don't have to use a lot, and it does work well. I got the 4 ounce container, and am going to order another one soon. I have recommended it to many of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie P. Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $35
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell of this product. I have used this product on my shoulder/neck area every day since I received it and have not noticed any improvement. I also have Plantar fasciitis and used the cream for this, to no avail. I feel that this is a very expensive jar of cream that has been advertised to seem like a wonder cream, but it's not. Also not returnable. Save your $35.
customer_reviews.author: hessfarms

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS ON MY KNEE PAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE USED THIS PRODUCT FOR A FEW YEARS NOW. I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH ABOUT THE RESULTS PENETREX GIVES ME. I FOLLOWED THE DIRECTIONS AND WITHIN A WEEK MY SEVERE KNEE PAIN WAS GONE. IT HAS NEVER RETURNED. IF I START TO FEEL A TWINGE OF PAIN ANYWHERE I IMMEDIATELY APPLY THE PENETREX. THIS IS SUCH A WONDERFUL PRODUCT. MY HUSBAND HAS STARTED USING IT TOO. YOU WILL NEVER REGRET PURCHASING PENETREX. I HAVE EVEN RECOMMENDED THIS TO MY DR. WHO WAS LOOKING FOR PAIN RELEIF FOR HER KNEES.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: 1,000% recommend
customer_reviews.text: With arthritis head to toe and peripheral neuropathy I started using this product.i was at the point where I was no longer able to walk or do much of any thing. After 4 weeks 90% of my pain is gone and after 8 years I am now able to have a life. Be patient it takes time but it works
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product! Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It truly helps with my knee. I had the surgery but it didn't alleviate the pain. Penetrex really makes a difference. I wish it would make it go away forever, but I use it at least 4 - 5 times a day and I feel the difference almost immediately. I bought a jar for my Mom who is having shoulder pain. I wish it would work longer, but I will continue to use this product. I recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly W.

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I had rotator surgery in 2016. I also was told I had arthritis and bursitis in my shoulder. After rehab my arm was still sore. I’ve always used aspercream for sore muscles. Well, aspercream didn’t help at all. So I searched Amazon and found Penetrex and ordered it right away. All I can say is that this product is amazing! My husband rubs it on the back of my shoulder at night so I can sleep and during the day if I need it. I also have arthritis in my kneee and it helps that. I highly recommend this product and I personally will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Cat

customer_reviews.title: It's good but no better than other products
customer_reviews.text: I did not hear about this product until lately. I have arthritis and muscle pains. This is no better than Australian Dream. It does the job better than the old Benguay which had a strong smell. I feel that Austratian Dream does the best job for me. Penetrex is a close second.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a soothing sensation.. I use it for my slightly torn knee cartilage . I opted for intense PT rather than surgery. My knee still hurts ea time I play tennis and will never be 100% at my age ( 60+) but with lots of ice and this cream I do get some definite relief each time. No it's not some miracle cure but honestly it helps, soothes and there is no after smell so yes definitely recco it Good luck PS The CSR team is awesome as well so that is a huge plus if you have any ? or comments 5 stars Kally
customer_reviews.author: Kally

customer_reviews.title: this is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a long time now for various chronic aches and pains from aging, arthritis, severe scoliosis, two hip replacements, and a bad shoulder. It has been a life saver on numerous occasions. Because I am very active, there have been times when Penetrex kept me moving. A little where and when I need it and I am good to go. Have never found anything else that works as well and have shared this good news with many friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: My neck and range of motion was so tight that driving was like playing Russian Roulette. I've been using the cream for about 2 months combined with Deep Rub cream at least twice a day I also found a pillow that forces me to keep my head at a perfect angle to my shoulders while sleeping Results have been amazing. Not perfect, but 90% better I attribute to the Penetrex as I was using the Deep Rub and pillow with mix results to that point It's not a huge investment. Try and it and use it as directed.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else. I'm a customer for life.
customer_reviews.text: I've already bought a second jar since I purchased my first one. That's how much this has helped my sciatica. I've tried, Theragesic, Icy Hot, Salonpas, oils, you name it. This cream is the real deal. It's not greasy at all and doesn't have a bad smell to it. It absorbs quickly into the skin and goes to work immediately. Any time I feel something coming on, I apply this (and you don't need a lot) and am pain free. I wouldn't be without it.
customer_reviews.author: Sclaus4

customer_reviews.title: Natural Pain relief without a prescription
customer_reviews.text: After back surgery I had a lot of nueropathic pain in my leg from the damage caused to the nerve after the herniation of the disc. I have ordered this product 3 times. I apply it in the afternoon after my leg starts to hurt and within minutes of applying I have immediate relief without the need for pain medication. It does as advertised. I had an issue with the last delivery and contacted customer service. A real person answered. The representative handled the matter quickly and actually made me feel like she cared. Rare in today's world of press one for whatever. I will continue to use this product and recommend it to whoever will listen
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands name is Thomas and rightfully so...he doubts everything! He suffers with constant joint and muscle pain (especially ankle) and has tried every topical on the market. I asked him to apply Penetrex to only one ankle before bedtime to see if there was any improvement. He had to admit the treated ankle was pretty much pain free! With that said he’s only used it twice so I’ll update in a month or so.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Diamond

customer_reviews.title: everyday maintenance and relief
customer_reviews.text: I had a meniscus tear in my knee, had surgery, and still had a nagging pain on a daily basis. I asked my doctor for a prescription for a topical NSAID gel that works great but I didn't want to use it on a regular basis. Began looking for an alternative solution and stumbled onto Penetrex. Started using it as directed and it brings daily relief to my aching knee. I've been using it for about a year now and it has become a nightly ritual to massage my knee with a small amount of Penetrex for pain maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: jeff dinardo

customer_reviews.title: This product WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product! First, let me say I am not paid or compensated in any way for this review. Penetrex is amazing! It begins resolving inflammation almost immediately and lasts for quite a while! I have arthritis in my knees which causes me quite a bit of discomfort at night because of inflammation. Using Penetrex has allowed me to sleep without pain. My husband uses it on his back and ankle to relieve inflammation. We bought a small jar and it was so effective, we ordered a larger jar that same evening!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I am on probably my fifth jar of Penetrex. I've had no reactions nor any burning, hot or breathing issues. The scent is light and pleasant. I've been using it for years as does my husband. I now leave a jar at work and have one at home. I am getting osteoarthritis in my fingers and have tried many other devices, creams, etc. but this is by far my favorite. Not sore why the one person had a reaction but I am sensitive with so many allergies (grass, trees mold, perfumes, you name it) and this has not bothered me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Hall

customer_reviews.title: Penetrex pain relief cream.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Penetrex for a year or so now to help clear up the occasional tendinitis in my elbow and shoulder from playing guitar. It works well for that. Recently after having severe lower back problems for about three weeks I tried Penetrex on it three times a day. Nothing had really helped make it better prior to using the Penetrex. But by the next morning there was a noticeable improvement. And over the next four days of use my back is almost completely better. This is great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ralfk

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years now. In 2003 I had foot surgery and have nerve damage and was still in considerable pain. I also have plantar fasciitis and a bad bunion. I’ve tried numerous products both over the counter and prescription and nothing helped. I tried Penetrex based on the reviews I read and am so happy I did. It’s the only thing that has helped. It has no odor, soaks in quickly. And for me I can’t put a price on relief from my pain. It’s so worth the cost. Give it a few weeks and I hope you find relief as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Penetrex for over 3 years. This became my number one anti inflammatory cream after taking up pilates & suffering with low back pain. I use it anytime & anywhere I’m sore. It definitely helps to sooth away the soreness & I like the pleasant scent and the formula goes on very smoothly. I have recommended Penetrex to many of my friends & family when I hear them mention inflammation pain in their body.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Use generously and it works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great cream, I strained the muscles near my knee to the point that I could not put any pressure on my left leg, I used Penetrex and the sharp pain turned into a dull pain almost immediately upon applying. The next morning I still had pain, but I applied some more penetrex and was able to walk with just a slight limp with dull pain. A week later, with nightly / daily use and the pain is almost gone and I can walk almost normally again. I’m thinking another 4/5 days and I’ll be as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: BigAlFromBklyn

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I'm always trying to find something my 94 year old cousin can use to help with the pain from her arthritis and varicose veins. She was so happy with this that I bought her another jar so she wouldn't run out. I also ordered some for myself. I really think it's the best thing I've ever used. Recommended it to a friend for her muscle spasms and she said it's helping her. Now I've got to buy some for my oldest daughter. It does cost a bit more but so far, it's been worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fast relief but not long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I have both types of Arthritis and Fibro, this product brought immediate relief of both throbbing and burning pain. It didn't seem to last as long as I would have liked. Pros: Faster relief than any other product I have tried, and I have tried a lot! Leaves skin feeling soft and not greasy. Rubs in well. Cons: Relief of pain didn't last for long, but maybe it has a build up where the more you use it the longer the relief?
customer_reviews.author: Bend RN

customer_reviews.title: I think it’s great.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got neuropathy in my feet from chemo. Sometimes I get needles piercing different areas of my feet at night which keeps me awake. I bought this based on the positive reviews. I figured it didn’t cost a fortune so I tried it. It worked wonderfully. Now just to let you know it is not a cure for my neuropathy. However, I get immediate relief at night and sleep very well with it. Thank you Penetrex. One additional thing, this does not get hot like Ben-Gay or capsaicin cream and it’s not cold like Mineral Ice or Icy-Hot. In fact I don’t know how this stuff works but all I know is that I will continue to use this cream.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of your pain
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from pain forever and used just about every creme, liquid and lotion available. Some helped a little, some more but some not at all. A friend in my husband's Monday morning breakfast was telling someone else about Penetrex Pain Relief Therapy and my husbands ears perked up. lol. We bought a jar immediately and it worked immediately. On my second jar and oh so happy. Works immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Does Help
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my husband who has radiculopathy from 3 back surgeries. His feet and lower legs hurt a lot, especially after standing. He states the Penetrex does help some but I wish he would use it more. He has never used it 3 times a day because he doesn't want to take the time. I have used it on knots in my lower back and it helps. I find the smell very relaxing and comforting.
customer_reviews.author: Bowman

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is our magic cream!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this magic cream for 5 years now and so far we have not found a thing it did not help! It is truly an amazing product. I am not paid in any way to rate this but when I find something that works like this, I will shout it from the rooftops!
customer_reviews.author: QueenRobyn

customer_reviews.title: Always a relief to open the jar!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for at least four years, first for gout flare-ups and general inflammation pain and now (as that problem is mostly solved) general muscle pain and over-use anywhere. My wife has been glad to have it, as well. It goes on cool with an amazing aroma and seems to calm jangled nerves as it works. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Glattly

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other product I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I had a recurring foot pain and I also have arthritis in a few spots like a thumb. I have tried numerous other pain relief gels and salves and none worked well until this one. A little goes a long way. It also doesn't have a strong scent, so you can use it if you're going out in public. I just ordered the larger size because I gave away what I had left in the smaller jar for someone else to try.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grace

customer_reviews.title: light scent, really works
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed at how well this stuff works on my shoulder. My husband has found that consistent use on his wrist has helped the inflammation he had with carpal tunnel surgery. The scent is about as strong as toothpaste and has not been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: No relief...Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't help at all. Ended up going back to Australian Dream and Raging Kakapo Pain Relief Cream, the latter of which worked the best probably because of more HISTAMINE.
customer_reviews.author: t4987sd

customer_reviews.title: helpful pain relief
customer_reviews.text: With chronic cervical spine pain, Im always looking for non-invasive therapies.. This mild and pleasant smelling balm goes on easily and leaves no sticky residue. It does provide relief from the pain, although doesn't last too long; I guess about an hour. However, re application is easy. I appreciate that is absorbs easily and leaves no residue. (you do need to let it absorb for about 5 min after massaging in, tho)
customer_reviews.author: auntie

customer_reviews.title: I like the texture
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few different products to control foot and lower leg pain. Penetrex does the job and I am a repeat buyer. It seems to be as effective as other choices for pain relief, but what I like best about it is its just right texture. It is not too watery and drippy, nor is it too thick and sticky. It goes on smooth and is quickly absorbed without leaving a sticky or greasy residue. It is comfortable to pull on clothes over it afterwards. Also it is relatively scentless as claimed.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hasher

customer_reviews.title: 6 month injury chronic pain and inconvenience gone in 3 days of use!
customer_reviews.text: I've had trigger thumb for 6 months. I've had a cortisone shot that wore off in 2 months. With that being said I've been struggling each day with my thumb getting stuck, constantly iceing, k taping and whatever I can do to get through the day .Penetrex solved my thumb problem in 3 days.All I do know is use penetrex whenever I feel the need to .There is no more pain just a little stiffness. The key is to massage it in for about a minute when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: WORKS for Fibro Pain & HEADACHES
customer_reviews.text: I just found a NEW USE! Today I had horrible headaches. I used the roll-on across my forehead and temples. Headache GONE. I couldn't believe it! I will use this again and again for all of my pain issues! This stuff is AMAZING! I have horrible fibromyalgia and sometimes my hands and feet are in such pain. Penetrex relieves me from that pain. When there is a stormfront mentioned on the news I immediately get my Penetrex ready. I’ve used the 2oz but opted for the 4oz this time, I don’t want to run out.
customer_reviews.author: Perk322

customer_reviews.title: great for aching knees
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the cream was not greasy. I had to use a knee brace on my right knee to reduce pain and allow me to put weight on it. I started using Penetrex by applying it 4 times a day. After 5 days I my knee pain subsided and was eliminated after a week even without the knee brace. I have been using it for a year now twice a day and have eliminated knee pain.
customer_reviews.author: r hickerson

customer_reviews.title: Really does work!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, there are some unpronounceable ingredients in with all the good natural ones but so many thousands of people gave it 5 stars I decided to try it. I'm just so tired of all the pain. Yes, it does, really does, work! I'm using it on arthritic and inflamed knees and hands and it really does lower the pain. I noticed it first application but I usually do when something works for me so you may not. Today I got scared I might use it up so I ordered 3 more with an almost $5 coupon from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: Snake oil
customer_reviews.text: It really did t do anything but give me a rash behind my knees kinda like dry skin which is ironic
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W.

customer_reviews.title: This Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe arthritis in my hands and my hands are my living. So I have been trying different products over the years and nothing has worked as well as Penetrex for pain relief. The pain never completely goes away, or the swelling but this helps settle things down a bit. Doesn't take much so a jar lasts a while depending on how many times you apply each day. I just ordered the bigger jar, I like it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Suzzie

customer_reviews.title: Reduces or Gets Rid of Inflammation
customer_reviews.text: The main purpose of this product was the reduction in inflammation as advertised. I used it as directed and it in fact got rid of the inflammation in my back and buttocks. I am at a point were I don't have to use it every day, but every now and then. While the source of my pain is still there, I find my life much more bearable. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cedric R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: PAIN RELIEF
customer_reviews.text: Ok I very rarely ever write a review. But I purchased Penetrex thinking what the heck I'll try it. my knee has been hurting me for years. Cortisone shots stopped working, I lost a few pounds and gave this a try. I am know back to bowling two days a week and golfing on the weekends. I rub it in before I go and don't think about my knee until someone asks. this is a product that will stay in my cabinet as long as they make it and I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A Greer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: I will keep buying
customer_reviews.text: This is good stuff. When you have any muscle or joint pain-stiffness, or any skin abrasions, put some of this cream on it and it will help quickly. I’ve been placing it on my quads and knees to loosen them up, especially around the IT bands, and it helps. You can feel the muscles relaxing and the pain going away. This is a very good cream that I will continue to use in addition to other remedies such as ice, heat, compression, and exercise. I will keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: MRM

customer_reviews.title: No Joke Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: Having suffered a hand injury a few years ago, two of my fingers were left with tendon and nerve damage. This stuff is one of the few things that actually seems to help. Not only does it noticeably soften the skin of my hand, but the scar tissue seems to have softened over time as well. There are some days that I forget about my hand pain now that I've started using this regularly. Really a worthwhile product in a sea of gimmicks
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F

customer_reviews.title: USE AS DIRECTED
customer_reviews.text: I was experiencing pain in my ankles and plantar fascia caused from the many years of running (over 30 years). I heard about this product from a friend and gave it a go. I followed the instructions and found out it actually works! It helped with my feet and ankles, so now I'm trying it on my knees. I'm guessing it will provide the same relief. I like the product so much, I recommend it to others. The only thing I wish about this product - the price to drop a little.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Reviews have been over-praised
customer_reviews.text: At the recommendation of several friends, I purchased the larger size of Penetrex. The delivery was on time as promised. The product, however, has been a disappointment. After using it for several days for arthritis in my hip, I have no noticeable improvement. I'll continue to use it but so far see no difference from using a less expensive drugstore product.
customer_reviews.author: Alice H.

customer_reviews.title: Really does Help
customer_reviews.text: Had Laminectomy still having pain had injections and PT tried just about everything They finally put me on Lyrica and I decided to try this also....I know everyone reacts differently some work others don’t This cream although didn’t completely eliminate the pain but Did reduces the intensity...gone thru 3 jars and use it 3times a day and it Has Help did not eliminate All the pain but did help Just about NO scent at all... will continue to purchase it . Remember Everyone has different results it’s just I have gotten the best results with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: ronald byzewski

customer_reviews.title: A Miracle of a Product
customer_reviews.text: In the midst of a very painful bout of bursitis I was rendered completely immobile for 2 weeks. I was told by doctors to just take ibuprofen, ice & rest. Still any movement was unbearable. My friends and family brought over every over the counter ointment, runs, sprays known to man. It wasn't until I applied the contents of the last jar that the pain immediately disappeared. I couldn't believe it and have been a loyal customer of Penetrex ever since. I prefer the ointment over the roll-on and use the product every single day to deal with my arthritic pain. You can spend more on another product but will not experience any better relief than this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Temporary Pain Relief When You Need It
customer_reviews.text: I have used if for lower back pain due to facet joint arthritis. I originally bought a small jar which I used up, and have now purchased a larger one. I use it when the pain is worsened by activity such as normal household chores, biking, standing, walking or yard work. When I use it, I have no intention of doing any more physical activity and the pain is at a fairly high level. It provides quick relief lasting an hour or so, but that is usually enough for my needs. If I don't use it after such activities, I have more pain that lasts for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always Keep it On Hand
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying Penetrex Inflammation Formulation creme for over 5 years. I apply it to my ankles every morning and night to help control chronic inflammation issues. While I have no medical proof that this stuff works, I have experienced less pain and limitation of use over time, and always keep a jar in the wings to ensure I never run out.
customer_reviews.author: For Real

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend/ Neuropathic Pain
customer_reviews.text: My mom is an Incomplete paraplegic with Spinal Cord Injury and she is constantly in pain. She has a “burning” sensation on her legs due to the fact that her injury is almost 4 decades old and the nerves are trying to “reconnect”. I have tried tens units/ gels/ creams/ etc etc and none of them give her the relief that Penetrex does. I also use it because I have on and off plantar fascitis and eliminates the pain 🙏
customer_reviews.author: CLARA G.

customer_reviews.title: Immediate pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Penetrex for at least a couple of years now. It works great for immediate, temporary pain relief. I use it on my elbows for tendonitis, my low back, bursitis in my left hip, shoulders and scapulas. Anywhere that it hurts. It has several well known inflammation fighting ingredients. It is a great product for the money. I use it several times throughout the day. Give it a try. It won't hurt (lol)!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Marks

customer_reviews.title: WOW🤩
customer_reviews.text: My right inner and putter thumb as well as my wrist hurts so very bad. It was to the point if I left an object That was slightly heavy I would immediately drop it. I would have to wear a wristband but it still hurt like crazy. My mom introduced me to this product and WOW!!! It is amazing... I am a true believer of PENETREX! I give this product FIVE STARS ⭐️ ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Ufuoma Akpovi

customer_reviews.title: Works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to treat foot neuropathy not due to diabetes. I followed the directions which states to apply over entire area of discomfort 3-4 times a day for the first week to ten days. After a week I do feel a difference with a reduction in pain and discomfort which comes with having neuropathy. My other options were surgery with no guarantees, expensive supplements not covered by insurance, or medications such as gabapentin which has side affects. I chose this product with the thought I had nothing to loose. So far it has worked beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Ludwick

customer_reviews.title: Penetrex Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: I work at a computer all day and my hands and wrists occasionally swell and are painful. I have found that using Penetrex relieves the pain and the swelling goes away. It acts as not just a pain reliever, but as a healing cream as well. I use it as a cream but I also have the roll on liquid which I keep in my bag and carry it to use during the day.
customer_reviews.author: theresa davidson

customer_reviews.title: Gets me through the day!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty physical job and over the years my right shoulder has really taken a hit. I’ve heard shoulder surgery comes with a lot of possible downsides. My physical therapist recommended this and it’s been great. I usually apply in the morning and the afternoon. It doesn’t get rid of the pain completely but it definitely helps to manage it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Relief Without Burning Heat!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product before and really liked it and so does my husband. I hate the other rubs with the strong smell. Many other rubs can't be rubbed on if you're going out, unless you don't mind that medicinal smell. This has a very light pleasant aroma and it leaves a nice cooling feel to that problem area. Great product! I purchased the 4oz. size this time, last time it was the 2oz.
customer_reviews.author: MuchaDoo

customer_reviews.title: Pentrex is a great product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a few years now. I have some arthritis and some neuropathy in one leg and knee. It helps more then anything I have used. It is important that you use 3-4 times a day for 7-10 days when first get it. After that you can use it as needed. It does not have a strong odor, so you can apply it before going to work or going away
customer_reviews.author: Billie Jo Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It does something but don't expect a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I apply it sometime to my thumb that hurts from glomus tumor and it mitigates the pain by about 20-30% but that's it. Don't expect it to act like a pain killer because you'll be disappointed. It helps but marginally. I don't think it is worth the price. It should cost half as much for the relief it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Works for crps
customer_reviews.text: Work really well for crps pain! My crps is manageable with this cream. I almost thought I have crps remission but then after taking a shower/bath/wash it off, the pain comes back! So I believe the cream keeps the pain/inflammation away. I’m waiting for it on sale and I will buy some more to stock up. It expires in a couple of years and one 4 oz jar may last me about two months. Hope the price is cheaper
customer_reviews.author: GWOODSONG
